professorOak.speaker: Professor Oak
professorOak.text: Hello there! Welcome to the world of Pokémon!

professorOak.speaker: Professor Oak
professorOak.text: My name is Oak! People call me the Pokémon Prof!

professorOak.speaker: Professor Oak
professorOak.text: This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon!

professorOak.speaker: Professor Oak
professorOak.text: For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use them for fights.

professorOak.speaker: Professor Oak
professorOak.text: Myself... I study Pokémon as a profession.
